CO1.question: A logistic regression model has parameters 1.5 and -2.3. If the input feature vector is 2 and -1, compute the output probability using the sigmoid function.

The activation function is ReLU. Compute its derivative at -3 and 5.
A softmax function is applied to [3,1,0]. Compute the probability for the first class.
The loss function is squared error (y - y_pred)^2. Compute the gradient with respect to y_pred.
Compute the eigenvalues of the weight matrix [[2, -1], [-1, 2]].
A batch normalization layer has a mini-batch mean of 3 and variance of 4. Compute the normalized value for input 5 before scaling and shifting.
A neural network has 1000 samples, input dimension 500, and a hidden layer with 200 neurons. Compute the number of trainable parameters excluding bias.
The input matrix is [[1, 2], [3, 4]], and the weight matrix is [[0.5, -1], [2, 3]]. Compute the output before activation.
The gradient descent update is theta = theta - alpha * gradient. If theta = 2, gradient = 3, and alpha = 0.01, compute the updated value of theta.
A neural network has two layers with weight matrices [[1, 2], [3, 4]] and [[-1, 0], [2, 1]]. Compute the number of multiplications required in a forward pass.
Xavier initialization is used for a layer with 128 input neurons and 64 output neurons. Compute the standard deviation of weight initialization.
Compute the derivative of tanh(x) at x = 0.5.
A dropout layer with probability 0.2 is used. If the input neuron has activation 0.8 before dropout, compute expected activation after dropout during training.
A CNN has a 3x3 filter applied to a 7x7 input with stride 2 and no padding. Compute the output dimension.
A pooling layer with a 2x2 filter and stride 2 is applied to a 6x6 feature map. Compute the output dimension.
A ResNet block has an input of 64x64x32 and undergoes two 3x3 convolutions. Compute the number of parameters (no bias).
An RNN has a hidden state of 100 neurons and input of 50 neurons. Compute trainable parameters in the hidden state update (excluding biases).
Compute the number of operations in a fully connected layer with 512 input neurons and 256 output neurons.
An LSTM cell has input size 32 and hidden state size 64. Compute the number of trainable parameters (excluding biases).
A GAN has a generator with an input noise vector of size 100 and a fully connected layer that outputs a 28x28 image. Compute trainable parameters in this layer.
Compute the memory needed to store activations for a batch size of 128, input 256x256x3, using 32-bit floating point format.
A ViT model divides a 224x224 image into 16x16 patches. Compute the number of patches.

A factory has 3 machines A, B, and C, which produce 25%, 35%, and 40% of the total products, respectively. The probabilities of these machines producing a defective item are 0.02, 0.03, and 0.05, respectively. If a randomly chosen product is found defective, what is the probability that it was produced by Machine A?

A ReLU activation function is used. What is the derivative at x = 0?

A softmax function is applied to [2, 1, 0]. Compute the probability of the first class.
A neural network has 512 input neurons and a hidden layer with 128 neurons. Compute the number of connections (excluding bias).
A 5x5 filter with stride 1 is applied to a 28x28 image with same padding. What is the output size?
Compute the number of parameters in a fully connected layer with 1024 input neurons and 256 output neurons.
A 2x2 pooling layer with stride 2 is applied to a 28x28 feature map. What is the output size?
A CNN has three convolutional layers, each with 32 filters of size 3x3 applied to a 64x64x3 input. Compute the number of trainable parameters (excluding biases).
Compute the variance of weight initialization using He initialization for a layer with 128 input neurons.
A GRU network has an input of 50 neurons and a hidden state of 100 neurons. Compute the total number of trainable parameters (excluding biases).
An attention mechanism has a query, key, and value matrix of size 128x128. Compute the number of parameters.
A neural network with dropout probability 0.25 has an expected activation of 0.8 before dropout. Compute expected activation after dropout during training.
A convolutional layer applies a 3x3 filter to a 128x128x64 feature map with stride 1 and same padding. Compute the output size.
A Transformer model has an embedding dimension of 512 and 8 attention heads. Compute the dimension of each head.
Compute the number of operations in a convolutional layer with 32 filters of size 3x3 applied to a 64x64x3 input with stride 1 and same padding.
An LSTM cell has 64 hidden units and an input size of 32. Compute the number of trainable parameters (excluding biases).
A neural network with 256 input neurons has a hidden layer with 128 neurons. Compute the number of multiplications in a forward pass.
A ViT model divides an image of size 512x512 into 16x16 patches. Compute the number of patches.
Compute the number of memory elements needed to store activations for a batch size of 64, with each sample having a 128x128x3 input stored in 32-bit floating-point format.
A CNN applies a 5x5 filter to a 256x256x3 image with stride 2 and same padding. Compute the output size.
Compute the total number of trainable parameters in a 3-layer MLP with sizes 512-256-128.

A company interviews three candidates M, N, and O. The chances of selection are 2:3:5. The probability that they will successfully execute a new strategy is 0.9, 0.7, and 0.5, respectively. If the strategy fails, what is the probability that O was selected?

A company employs 800 software developers, 600 testers, and 400 managers. The probability of a project delay occurring due to each group is 0.03, 0.05, and 0.07, respectively. If a delay is reported, what is the probability that a developer was responsible?
